parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Broken Commands

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets simul cloud cover. This command does not affect overcast value. 

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Warning</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>This command has now been removed</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''simulSetHumidity''' humidity

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> humidity: [[Number]] - 0 (min): clear sky, 1 (max): heavy cloud cover

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[simulSetHumidity]] 1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> When combined with [[setOvercast]] 1 this command will also start random strength rain.<code>[[skipTime]] -24;
86400 [[setOvercast]] 1;
[[skipTime]] 24;
[[simulSetHumidity]] 1;
</code>Creates rainy looking weather, followed by thunder in about 10 seconds and rain in about 20.

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[overcast]], [[setOvercast]]
</value></part></template></root>
